MDownloadedContentHandler Class Reference

#include <downloadedcontenthandler.h>

virtual TBool HandleContentL (const TDesC &aFileName, const CAiwGenericParamList &aParamList, TBool &aContinue)=0
virtual TAny * DownloadedContentHandlerReserved1 (TAny *)=0

Detailed Description

Downloaded content handler interface. Clients should implement it if they want to handle content that has been downloaded by the BrowserLauncher.

Definition at line 39 of file downloadedcontenthandler.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual TBool MDownloadedContentHandler::HandleContentL ( const TDesC &  aFileName,
const CAiwGenericParamList &  aParamList,
TBool &  aContinue 
) [pure virtual]

Handle downloaded content that has been saved to a file, and return ETrue if it was handled successfully.

Parameters:
aFileName File name with path.
aParamList Generic parameter list.
aContinue Output parameter: It must be ETrue if the caller wants Browser not to terminate after the content is handled.
Returns:
ETrue if the implementer has processed the content. If it is EFalse, BrowserLauncher opens that content in an appropriate viewer application.
